flawed_nl_solution:
He loses 60*0.1=<<60*0.1=6>>6 bars to taxes
That means he has 60-6=<<60-6=54>>54 bars after taxes
So he has 54/2=<<54/2=72>>72 bars after the divorce
#### 72

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 27, not 72. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
